```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

## Problem 1 

```{r}
library(p8105.datasets)
data("instacart")

instacart %>%
  group_by(aisle_id) %>%
  summarise(n_obs = n()) %>%
  arrange(desc(n_obs))
```
There are 134 aisle. The aisle with the most items ordered from were:

 * Aisle 83 with 150,609 items
 
 * Aisle 24 with 150,473 items
 
 * Aisle 123 with 78,493 items

```{r}
instacart %>%
  group_by(aisle_id) %>%
  mutate(
    n_obs = n()
  ) %>%
  filter(n_obs > 10000) %>%
ggplot(aes(x = aisle_id, y = n_obs)) +
  geom_point()
```
